package.name: ProstylePc_PrepaidOnly
package.summary: Restrict COD payment using custom attribute.
package.description: Restrict the Cash on Delivery payment method based on custom attribute value. You have to create an attribute with name "prepaid_only" with Catalog Input Type for Store Owner YES/NO. If you set yes the COD will not be available as a payment method also please note that this extension requires an existing phoenix cash on delivery payment method on your store.
package.notes: You have to create an attribute with Attribute Code: prepaid_only and Catalog Input Type for Store Owner: Yes/No. Please note that this extension requires an existing phoenix cash on delivery payment method on your store
